meanings.definition: In a petty or trivial manner
meanings.sent1: She nigglingly rearranged the pens on her desk for the tenth time.
meanings.sent2: He nigglingly complained about the color of the walls in his office.
meanings.sent3: The cat nigglingly batted at the string, pretending to be annoyed.
meanings.sent4: The old clock nigglingly ticked away the seconds, reminding him of time passing.
meanings.sent5: The rain nigglingly tapped on the window, creating a soothing rhythm.

meanings.sent1: The nigglingly itchy tag on his shirt bothered him all day.
meanings.sent2: She had a nigglingly uncomfortable feeling that she had forgotten something important.
meanings.sent3: The nigglingly persistent fly buzzed around the room, driving everyone crazy.
meanings.sent4: The nigglingly tight shoes pinched her toes with every step.
meanings.sent5: The nigglingly loud ticking of the clock kept him awake all night.
